purpleculture_pinyin:
kē
classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
классификатор для маленьких сфер, жемчуга, кукурузных зерен, зубов, сердечек, спутников и т. д.
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 颗)
Pictophonetic: 頁 indicates the sound; 果 (grain) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
顆粒 [ kē lì ]: kernel; granule; granulated (sugar, chemical product)
顆粒歸倉 [ kē lì guī cāng ]: Every grain should be sent to the granary. (idiom)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 果 [ guǒ ] fruit, nut; result
    • 頁 [ yè ] page, sheet, leaf
heisig_chinese_memo: Fruits starts the size of a granule, and some grow as big as your head.
Ru_trainchinese: kē: (графема/сч.слово) зернышко, крупинка, гранула, комочек; счетное слово для небольших круглых предметов
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Everytime you eat fruit it puts vitamins in your head which are like little healthy granules of matter.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " page ", the sound of " fruit " indicates small, round objects. "Shuowen": "Small heads. From the page, the sound of fruit." Tang Baijuyi "Ti Junzhong Lychee": "Sweet fat palms, nectar tongue pulp."

" Ke " can also be used as a quantifier. Tang Dufu "Savage Gives Zhu Ying to Zhu Ying": "Sorrow is still broken after meticulous writing a few times, and Xu Tong is surprised by the uniformity of 10,000 pieces."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " page ", the sound of " fruit " indicates small, round objects.
humanum_full_description:
從「頁」，「果」聲，表示形狀小、圓的物體。《說文》：「小頭也。从頁，果聲。」唐白居易〈題郡中荔枝〉：「燕脂掌中顆，甘露舌頭漿。」

　　「顆」也可用作量詞。唐杜甫〈野人送朱櫻〉：「數迴細寫愁仍破，萬顆勻圓訝許同。」
humanum_short_description: 從「頁」，「果」聲，表示形狀小、圓的物體。

(Simplified: 颗)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 頁 indicates the sound; 果 (grain) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 5
Freq: 7901
Chinese: Fruits starts the size of a granule, and some grow as big as your head.
Meaning: granule
Hanzi: 颗
Story: Everytime you eat fruit it puts vitamins in your head which are like little healthy granules of matter.
Kind: traditional

從「 頁 」，「 果 」聲，表示形狀小、圓的物體。《說文》：「小頭也。从頁，果聲。」唐白居易〈題郡中荔枝〉：「燕脂掌中顆，甘露舌頭漿。」 「 顆 」也可用作量詞。唐杜甫〈野人送朱櫻〉：「數迴細寫愁仍破，萬顆勻圓訝許同。」
From " page", the sound of " fruit" indicates small, round objects. "Shuowen": "Small heads. From the page, the sound of fruit." Tang Baijuyi "Ti Junzhong Lychee": "Sweet fat palms, nectar tongue pulp." " Ke" can also be used as a quantifier. Tang Dufu "Savage Gives Zhu Ying to Zhu Ying": "Sorrow is still broken after meticulous writing a few times, and Xu Tong is surprised by the uniformity of 10,000 pieces."

顆字的基本解释

顆
kē
见“颗”。

顆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kē］
［《廣韻》苦果切，上果，溪。］
“颗1”的繁体字。
(1)泛指粒状物。
(2)量词。计小而圆的物体。
(3)量词。计块状物。
(4)量词。棵。用于植物。
(5)量词。头。用于兽、牲畜。
(6)量词。支。用于枪械。
(7)通“堁”。土块。
(8)用同“款”。参见“顆恰”。

顆字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顆； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1406第06
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?苦果切，科上聲。【說文】小頭也。　又【韻會】今言物一顆，猶一頭也。【六書故】凡圜物以顆計。又珠琲曰顆。　又與堁同。土塊。【前漢·賈山傳】使其後世曾不得蓬顆蔽冡而托葬焉。【註】顆謂土塊。蓬顆，謂塊上生蓬者也。　又【集韻】苦緩切，音款。草名。【爾雅·釋草】菟奚，顆凍。【註】款冬也。【疏】藥草。一名菟奚，一名顆涷。　又人名。魏顆，晉大夫。史顆，秦大夫。見【左傳】。　【正字通】本作顆，九畫。《字彙》附八畫，非。顆字左原作田下木。

顆字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

kē

Pieces
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kē］
["Guangyun" bitter fruit cut, fruit on, stream. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Sec 1".
(1) Generally refers to granular substances.
(2) Quantifiers. Count small and round objects.
(3) Quantifiers. Count the lumps.
(4) Quantifiers. Tree. Used in plants.
(5) Quantifiers. head. Used for beasts and livestock.
(6) Quantifiers. support. Used for firearms.
(7) Through "堁". Clods.
(8) Use the same "section". See "Pecha".
Pieces
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　Ge; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1406 Page 06
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? The bitter fruit is cut, and the subject is sound. [Said the text] Small head too.　[Yunhui] There is only one thing today, but one end. [Six Books and Gu] All things are counted in pieces. Another Zhuxuan said.　Same as Hori again. Clods. [Previous Han·Jia Shan Biography] It made the future generations to be buried without being concealed. [Note] A piece is called a clod. Peng particles, that is, those who live on the block also.　[Jiyun] bitterly cut, sound section. Cursive name. 【Erya·Shucao】Dodder, frozen. [Note] Coltsfoot also. 【Sparse】Herbs. One is a dodder, and the other is a star.　Another name. Wei Ke, Doctor Jin. Shi Ke, Doctor Qin. See [Zuo Zhuan].　【Zhengzitong】This is a piece of nine paintings. "Words" comes with eight paintings, non. The word "Zuo" was originally made by Tian Shimogi.
